para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:9px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:14px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.46; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: is only capable of receiving relatively minor patches from the Dolphin update site. Dolphin Smalltalk upgrades that involve larger modifications will usually require that the entire product be re-downloaded and re-installed. If there is a newer version of Dolphin ready for download, Live Update will alert you to this fact when it connects to the update site.
